entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is being treated poorly by his relatives.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is spoiled and mean.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is equally cruel and abusive as her husband.

entities.name: mr h. potter
entities.description: The recipient of the letter that was delivered to Harry's house.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is treating Harry poorly and abusively.
Uncle Vernon is protecting Dudley from Harry's anger.
The letter that was delivered to Harry's house is addressed to Mr. H. Potter.
